import { useState } from "react"; export default function Signup() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", address: "", city: "", postcode: "", vat: "", phone: "", email: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", }); const handleUserState = (event) => { setUser({ ...user, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; return (

Signup

); }
